title: Va Va En Devathaye Lyrics Abhiyum Naanum
stanzas:
va va en dhevaithiye
pon vaai pesum thaaragaiye
poi vazhvin pooraname
pen poove vaa...(2)

vaan midhakkum kangalukku
mayil iragaal mai idavaa
maarbudhaikkum kaalgalukku
mani kolusu naanidavaa

va va en dhevaithiye
pon vaai pesum thaaragaiye
poi vazhvin pooraname
pen poove vaa..

selva magal azhugai pol
oru silrendra sangeetham
kaettathillai
pon magalin punnagai pol
yuga pookkalukku
punnagaikka theriyavillai

en pillai ettu vaithu
nadantha nadaiyai pol
andha ilakkana kavithaiyum
nadanthathillai.

muththukkal therikindra
mazhalai pol oru
munnooru mozhigalil
vaarthaigal illai.

thanthaikkum thaai amutham
surandhathammaa
en thangathai maarbodu
anaikkayile.

va va en dhevaithiye
pon vaai pesum thaaragaiye
poi vazhvin pooraname
pen poove vaa..

pillai nila palli sella
aval paiyyodu 
en idhayam thudikka
kanden

dheva magal thoongayile
sila dheivangal 
thoongukindra
azhagai kanden.

sittraadai katti aval
siritha pothu
ennai petraval saayal
endru pesikonden

melnaatu aadai katti
nandatha pol ival
meesai illaatha 
magal endru sonnen. 

pen pillai thani arai
pugunthathile
oru pirivukku
oththigaiyai 
paarthu konden. 

va va en dhevaithiye
pon vaai pesum thaaragaiye
poi vazhvin pooraname
pen poove vaa...(2)

vaan midhakkum kangalukku
mayil iragaal mai idavaa
maarbudhaikkum kaalgalukku
mani kolusu naanidavaa
category: Song:Va Va En Devathaye - Abhiyum Naanum
